text:
In addition to the delegation of authority set forth in Sections 
4.112, 
4.113, 
4.114, 
4.115, and 
B3.581 of the Charter and by Section 
2A.173 of this Code, (i) pursuant to Charter Section 
4.113, the Recreation and Parks Commission shall have the power to Lease Real Property under its jurisdiction subject to approval by the Board of Supervisors as required by Charter Section 
9.118 and any other applicable provision of the Charter or this Code, and (ii) pursuant to Charter Section 
4.112, the Public Utilities Commission shall have exclusive power to Lease Real Property under its jurisdiction, subject to approval by the Board of Supervisors as required by Charter Section 
9.118 and any other applicable provision of the Charter or this Code. 
(Added by Ord. 15-01, File No. 001965, App. 2/2/2001. Former Sec. 23.35 was renumbered as 23.55 by Ord. 15-01.)

heading.catch_text: LEASE OF REAL PROPERTY UNDER RECREATION AND PARKS COMMISSION AND PUBLIC UTILITIES COMMISSION JURISDICTION.
